diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $CD$ is $27$ units.
The length of the line $CA$ is $b$ units.
The length of the line $BD$ is $15$ units.
The length of the line $CB$ is $28$ units.
Point $A$ lies on the line connecting $B$ and $C$.
The measure of angle $BDA$ is equal to the measure of angle $ADC$.
line_instances: The lines $BA$, $BC$, and $CA$ form a triangle $ABC$.
The lines $BD$, $CD$, and $DA$ form a triangle $BCD$.
